body:
So I'm currently in the process and have a slight problem.
So when I had edited it looked what it looked like and the 3D parts hadn't worked because the paint was pure white not trasparent. So how to make areas transparent, oh and I'm on Paint.NET

title: Skin help

replies.body: select all the area you want to make transparent and press delete
